DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare bioavailability tolerability BIA 5-453 fast fed condition .
DOC.detailed_description: This Single-centre , two-way crossover , randomise , open-label study 12 healthy male volunteer . Subjects receive single oral 200 mg dose BIA 5-453 follow standard meal one period , follow least 10 hour fast another period . Treatment period separate washout interval 2 week .
